00048 /** 
00049  * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00050  * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00051  * 
00052  * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00053  * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00054  * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00055  * 
00056  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00057  */
00058 bool QuantMethodReport::reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00059                                       QuantMethod &qMethod,
00060                                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00061                                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00062                                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00063   return true;
00064 }

00066 
00067 void QuantMethodReport::addStdHeaders(QuantMethodReport *qReport,
00068                                               const std::string& execGuid, 
00069                                               const std::string& reportGuid,
00070                                               const std::string& timeStr,
00071                                               const std::string& commandLine,
00072                                               const std::string& execVersion,
00073                                               const AnalysisInfo& info)
00074 {
00075   std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator keyIx, paramIx;
00076   //
00077   for(keyIx = info.m_ParamNames.begin(), paramIx = info.m_ParamValues.begin();
00078       keyIx != info.m_ParamNames.end() && paramIx != info.m_ParamValues.end();
00079       ++keyIx, ++paramIx) {
00080     // @todo should we using the AffymetrixParameterConsts.h #defined values?
00081     qReport->addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-" + *keyIx, *paramIx);
00082   }
00083   for(keyIx = info.m_ClientInfoNames.begin(), paramIx = info.m_ClientInfoValues.begin();
00084       keyIx != info.m_ClientInfoNames.end() && paramIx != info.m_ClientInfoValues.end();
00085       ++keyIx, ++paramIx) {
00086     // @todo should we using the AffymetrixParameterConsts.h #defined values?
00087     qReport->addHeader("affymetrix-application-meta-data-info-" + *keyIx, *paramIx);
00088   }
00089 }
